entities.name: weasley's bedroom door
entities.description: The door is mentioned as being closed at the beginning of the passage.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins who are crouching in the shadows on the landing.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other twin who is crouching in the shadows on the landing.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as dismantling his and Ron's room in search of his badge.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having a room that Percy is searching through.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is being protected by Fudge and the Weasleys.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is mentioned as being after Harry.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister who has been lenient with Harry because he was relieved to find him alive.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is mentioned as a place where there are plenty of wizards to keep an eye on Harry.

entities.name: ministry cars
entities.description: The Ministry is sending two cars to take the Weasleys and Harry to the station tomorrow.

relationships.description: Fred and George are mentioned as being twins who are crouching in the shadows on the landing.
Percy is searching through Ron's room for his badge.
Fudge has been lenient with Harry because he was relieved to find him alive and is sending cars to take them to the station tomorrow.
